content.p: This section contains the policies and procedures that guide the University's research degree programmes. Its content is applicable to staff and students across all of the UK, China and Malaysia campuses. Induction and training Registration, attendance and study Resources and facilities Responsibilities of the student Responsibilities of the Postgraduate Student Advisor Responsibilities of the School Policy on PGR maternity / paternity / adoption leave Policy on PGR sick leave Postgraduate researchers studying away / in outside organisations Student Services Graduate School - PGR GS-PGR@nottingham.edu.cn student_registry@nottingham.edu.my Quality-Manual-Enquiries@nottingham.ac.uk Portland Building, University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD
